item.variousadditions.wooden_coin_descri: §n100% Wood. Do not use by open flames.§r
item.variousadditions.bamboo_coin_descri: Bamboo? Frick yeah I can buy shampoo now!
item.variousadditions.ender_coin_descrip: §5§oIt appears to be closely watching you.§r
item.variousadditions.thaumium_coin_desc: §5§oStrange, you believe that it is whispering secrets to you§r
jei.variousadditions.wooden_coin_descrip: Wooden Coins have a 2% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.stone_coin_descript: Stone Coins have a 1.5% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.iron_coin_descripti: Iron Coins have a 1% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.gold_coin_descripti: Gold Coins have a 0.5% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.diamond_coin_descri: Diamond Coins have a 0.25% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.emerald_coin_descri: Emerald Coins have a 0.175% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.prismarine_coin_des: Prismarine Coins have a 0.25% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs or a 0.5% chance to be dropped by a Guardian. (Normal and Elder)
jei.variousadditions.glass_coin_descript: Glass Coins have a 0.30% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.nether_star_coin_de: Nether Star Coins have a 0.0875% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs or a 0.175% chance to be dropped by a Wither Boss.
jei.variousadditions.bamboo_coin_descrip: Bamboo Coins have a 0.5% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.ender_coin_descript: Ender Coins have a 0.25% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs or a 0.5% chance to be dropped by an Enderman.
jei.variousadditions.cookie_coin_descrip: Cookie Coins have a 1.0% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs.
jei.variousadditions.bell_coin_descripti: Bell Coins have a 0.1% chance to be dropped by hostile mobs or a 0.2% chance to be dropped by a Villager.
jei.variousadditions.missing_coin_descri: Missing Coins have a 0.001% chance to be dropped by any mob.
jei.variousadditions.thaumium_coin_descr: Thaumium Coins have a 0.25% chance to be dropped by Witches.
jei.variousadditions.coin_description: All coins are only obtainable through mob drops.
